How Aucklanders can use contactless payment on public transport from this weekend https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/how-aucklanders-can-use-contactless- payment-on-public-transport-from-this-weekend/IXN47MY6DFCZPMYFJHF7CTKVNY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/how-aucklanders-can-use-contactless- payment-on-public-transport-from-this-weekend/IXN47MY6DFCZPMYFJHF7CTKVNY/ The new payment method is commonly used on transport systems elsewhere around the world. Thu, 14 Nov 2024 06:36:29 +0000 The Government has announced contactless payments on Auckland’s public transport network will come into effect from this weekend. Photo / Auckland Transport

Five more arrests in operation targeting Comancheros motorcycle gang https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Five-more-arrests-in-operation-targeting-comancheros-motorcycle-gang/GF7TNAUAJBBFDA4HKSYCSGAOLE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Five-more-arrests-in-operation-targeting-comancheros-motorcycle-gang/GF7TNAUAJBBFDA4HKSYCSGAOLE/ Katie OliverThis brings the total number of arrests to 31 for the operation. Thu, 14 Nov 2024 03:57:50 +0000 The Comancheros are an Australian motorcycle club that established a chapter in New Zealand six years ago when a small but influential group were deported as “501s” by Australian authorities.
